0.2.0.name: kobalt2-syntax
0.2.0.description: A blue cobalt dark theme for syntax based on Cobalt2 from wesbos

readme:
# Kobalt2 Syntax for Atom Theme is a fork of Cobalt2-Atom theme from wesbos! I changed some colors and removed unnecessary hardly-visible backgrounds. An Atom syntax theme based on blue cobalt theme. A refined color scheme that is easy on the eyes. Pairs well with built-in One Dark UI Theme. SQL
![Screenshot](https://github.com/atranel/kobalt2-atom/raw/master/sql.png)

PHP
